entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
